title: VimFu — Jump to Percentage
description: 50% jumps to the middle of the file. Any number followed by percent goes to that percentage through the file.

setup.comment: Set TERM for proper color support in Neovim
Create demo file — RPG quest log (40 lines, scrolls off screen)

setup.content:
# quest log
quest_1 = "find the lost sword"
quest_2 = "rescue the princess"
quest_3 = "defeat the goblin king"
quest_4 = "collect ten mushrooms"
quest_5 = "explore the dark cave"

setup.comment: Launch nvim with line numbers for percentage navigation

steps.say: A number then percent jumps to that percentage through the file.
Line twenty. The screen scrolled to the middle of the file.
One hundred percent. The very last line.
The final boss. Bottom of the file.
Three quarters through. Trick the shadow fox.
One percent goes back to the top.
Line one. Back where we started.
Number percent. Jump anywhere in a big file without knowing line numbers.
